description: Download, saves and executes a DLL.

customAttributes.name: downloadFrom
customAttributes.description: The URL to to download the assembly from.

customAttributes.name: assemblyName
customAttributes.description: The name of the assembly to call into.

customAttributes.name: methodName
customAttributes.description: The name of the method in the assembly to call

compilationAttributes.name: saveAs
compilationAttributes.description: Name of the powershell file to be created, can be full path or just a name
